website_summaries.verdict: Frying your favorite foods has never been easier with this user-friendly digital air fryer.
pros: Adjustable preset button for your favorite food
Comes with nonstick drawer and food basket
Free recipe book and app included
cons: Though the manufacturer says the drawer and basket are dishwasher safe, customers say otherwise

customer_reviews.title: Non-Stick Coating Peeling Off.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this Oct 2016, and the non stick coating inside the container, and on the pull handle has started to peel off in a bad way!! It is a HEALTH HAZARD! It used to fry and grill to our satisfaction, We would use it 3-4 times a week, mainly for french fries, fish sticks, fried chicken sometimes.... BUT it has a manufacturing fault it seems like it. Take a look at the pics I am posting. It is unusable anymore.
customer_reviews.author: nadia remtulla

customer_reviews.title: It looks like a big quality control issue for a product that ...
customer_reviews.text: We have ordered and sent back two of these Philips Airfryers. The first had wires loose and it looked used. The more recent ex larg Philips Airfryer order the plug was missing one of the two flat prongs. It looks like a big quality control issue for a product that is suppose to be top of the line. It was a Christmas gift. Can’t Philips do any better than that?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What Happened!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received this Airfryer and was so excited to start using it. I unboxed it, read the directions and ready to go! I made a batch of fries and family was raving over how good they were. Then I put my husbands steak in it and ready to cook it, checked the temperature and hit the start button nothing happened. I thought oh no did I blow a fuse or something.... Nope, the machine just quit working!! I only had it for a few hours. Had to box it up and send back. This had really good reviews, just didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could return this. It doesn't perform any better than the simple one I have by T-Fal. In fact, I think I like the T-Fal better since it moves the food around for even heating. There are many other functions that it might do well, but those are not great for me since I feed an army daily! I really wanted it for healthier fried potatoes and other veggies.
customer_reviews.author: energizer

customer_reviews.title: Easier to Keep Clean That a Stove
customer_reviews.text: There are 2 in our household so the XL size means I'm done after cooking 1 batch of most things. I was getting tired of cleaning the entire stove after frying a few pieces of bacon or something. Yes, I could use the microwave to cook bacon but I don't like how nuked bacon taste. I enjoy bacon in this fryer though. I bought a separate air fryer cookbook because the Philips web site cookbook is sort of sketchy. Now I've figured out the process and can cook most items w/o a cookbook. The biggest change is the seasoning has to adhere tightly to (cling to) food. Otherwise the air will just blow your seasonings off when you cook.
customer_reviews.author: Eze

customer_reviews.title: FATAL FLAW OF DIGITAL DISPLAY
customer_reviews.text: Digital display is a major problem! While you cook, the display would go haywire by itself. Adding and subtracting temperature and time... some time it turn off while cooking like someone hit the power off...then turn itself back on and may even start cooking all over again...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like this so much more
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this so much more. Tater tots and anything potatoes in this are awesome. However, cooking bacon or anything with oil will cause grease to vent into the kitchen of course. You really need to use it outside or next to a significant vent. I found the temperature recs to be way off. Most recipes called for it to cook at 190 degrees. However, I found I had to put it on 24-260 to get the items cooking in the time recommended.
customer_reviews.author: chrispop

customer_reviews.title: Super crispy french fries and tater tots that DO NOT ...
customer_reviews.text: ordered this with every intention of returning it....not going to happen. Super crispy french fries and tater tots that DO NOT get soggy after they cool down. Perfect cooked and beautiful grilled cheese sandwhiches, uncooked sausages cooked to perfection and a lot of things not in the cook book. YES, this is a "convection oven" however, the fan speed creates a virtual tornado inside the cooking chamber, I think it very important that everyones understands I was NOT paid or compensated in any way for this review.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Parker

customer_reviews.title: Rock Solid Performance!!
customer_reviews.text: This fryer is a fantastic addition to our kitchen! So far, we've used it to make sweet potato fries and chips, meatballs, and a variety of chicken entrees. The quality is spot on, and seems to be holding up very well to our use. It's a breeze to use and clean. I'd recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Y

customer_reviews.title: How  to fix it?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this airfryer: It work very well for six months but now it has a noise that gives me the impression that could be the fan. This noise begins in the preheating process. But when you start cooking you hear it less. There is some manual to disarm it and fix it ? I'm in Venezuela. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Maritza Oráa de Cova

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BE FOOLED
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a year ago.It was rated #3 as AIR FRYER'S.I have called phillips cause I could not clean it, they were NO help.Spent 300.00 dollars on this thing?I have tried everything to clean it,Video's and YOU TUBE. The thing is THE Element has a heat shield, No brush can REACH.So when you clean with BAKING SODA and WATER and run on 200 degrees for 20 Minutes, you left with a WHITE RESIDUE you can not get to. That CRAP WILL FALL on YOU FOOD? I have found another BRAND that you CAN Actually CLEAN! They don't tell YOU THAT WHEN YOU BUY IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: freddie

customer_reviews.title: Ok I Admit It, I'm Addicted To It
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for Mother's Day. I never thought I'd be using it. It didn't take long, now I use it for everything. Cooking, Heating food up, everything. Sure if you nuke it, it'll be quicker, but NOT tastier. Experimentation is the key, pick a temp and adjust the time to your liking. I've NEVER used oil. French Fries are awesome, hot dogs, burgers, sausage, re-heated pizza. Clean up is a breeze. What's not to like. Ok I wish it were cheaper, but even at the price I paid. I'm more than satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: John Greene

customer_reviews.title: I payed a lot to get a good product, what I received was anything but
customer_reviews.text: I payed a lot to get a good product, what I received was anything but. I don't want to waste anymore of my time on this so here's the bullet points: Pros: *When it works the food is great, I really wish there weren't any issues because I really enjoy cooking with it. Cons: * Display goes random at times increasing and decreasing cook-time and temperature. * When closed there is a large gap on one side of the unit that allows heat to escape. * The whole thing feels like it was made from cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: every time I try to cook in it it smokes so bad. My whole house will be filled like a ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very unhappy with Thai air fry .no where did I read that you cannot cook bacon,sausage,chicken with skin etc .every time I try to cook in it it smokes so bad.My whole house will be filled like a bar room with smoke.I have had other one from a local department store that didn't smoke at all.
customer_reviews.author: becky

customer_reviews.title: Emits smoke and sets off the smoke alarm constantly
customer_reviews.text: Works great on non-fat items, but don't cook anything that has fat in it like wings or bacon. The drain pan has to be wiped clean with the smallest amount of fat in it (literally every 2-3 minutes), or it emits smoke and sets off the smoke alarms. We have asked friends who have different brand air fryers (that cost a lot less) if they have this problem and they do not. Very disappointed with this purchase. Do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: OC Girl

customer_reviews.title: It won’t quit smoking
customer_reviews.text: I really liked that the food wasn’t greasy and that it was crispy, but I can’t get past how it won’t quit smoking it fills the entire house with smoke. I have cleaned it properly and even drained any grease in the bottom but it still continues. The worse $300 I have spent
customer_reviews.author: Not a happy camper

customer_reviews.title: A poor variation on a convection oven and it makes a ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fry anything. A poor variation on a convection oven and it makes a mess inside the cooking compartment, with no way to clean the heating element and behind it. I returned mine.
customer_reviews.author: One Bad Dog

customer_reviews.title: Will only set temp in 30 degree increments.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this no more than 3 or 4 times. The first couple of uses were okay, but now it will only go with 30 degree increments. That does not work for this expensive appliance. I'd have to call it pretty much useless.
customer_reviews.author: H C

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect foods to taste like they are deep fried
customer_reviews.text: We use this almost every day. Heats up very quickly and cooks food much faster than our oven. Don't expect foods to taste like they are deep fried, but the food does come out crispy and overall tasty. This is a great alternative to deep frying and using the oven. It has become a really convenient appliance for us. Easy to use and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to cooking but don’t expect to cook a full meal in it if you’re cooking for more than one person.
customer_reviews.text: This hot air fryer has made my cooking better. I fixed honey sirarcha wings last night. Other favorites are breakfast sandwiches, sweet and sour salmon, blueberry breakfast bars, bacon-wrapped teriyaki shrimp, and potato wedges. Phillips XL Airfryer has opened a whole new world of cooking and I look forward to trying more recipes. Give yourself time to adjust and sometimes fail, it’ll be worth it. My only concern is that it’s still on the small side. So when fixing a full meal I have to decide which part of the meal will be cooked in the Airfryer and which will be cooked conventionally.
customer_reviews.author: chaser193

customer_reviews.title: Food comes out pretty tasty but you can fit so little in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Food comes out pretty tasty but you can fit so little in the basket that if you are cooking for more than two people you will be there all night.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Foster

customer_reviews.title: Best Air Fryer
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research on which air fryer was the best rated. All the ratings said the Philips 9240 was the best! I agree. It is on the larger side (Xl) but I read a lot of reviews and people all agreed that the food cooks better when it is spread out and not all cramped in. It is also large enough to use small cooking dishes. Very easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: KathyW

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment!
customer_reviews.text: not sure what warmth rating is.. but have used the air fryer for several weeks now and I must say it is a welcome addition in our kitchen! Ease of use and healthy cooking .. love the fries, and burgers and other foods that typically used to be microwaved or cooked with oil. Cleaning is easy, but i didn't give 5 stars only because of the screen basket can get crusty when cooking burgers where the oil drips.. but overall very happy with the investment! The philips was pricier than some others but we have been happy with the philips brand.
customer_reviews.author: ThatVintageDude06

customer_reviews.title: Loved the food prepared on it but needed something to ...
customer_reviews.text: A friend had the regular sized, non-XL. Loved the food prepared on it but needed something to feed a family of 4 with the first batch. The XL does that for me. Gotta get that Airfryer rack though. 4 steaks, 4 Salmon Fillets, 2 packs of party wings, no problem
customer_reviews.author: Marc T.

customer_reviews.title: Quick, safe, straightforward
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. It was hard to choose an air fryer with so many mixed reviews out there. We'll see how durable it proves to be over time. As of now, I'm loving this as part of my keto cooking. I've been able to make crab cakes, perfect brussel sprouts and a first attempt at chicken cracklings. Clean up is straight forward and dare I say, faster than when I would fry and have it splatter everywhere (including on me). I appreciate not having to use as much oil as would have been needed for a deep fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Keto gourmands

customer_reviews.title: You've got to buy this if you cook at all.
customer_reviews.text: a must have for any kitchen, I found there is only one thing I suggest not to put in this airfryer BACON, only because the grease splatters and it smokes up the house (yes I did this) the bacon came out wonderful but don't do it. I've tried meats roasts ,steaks, pork loin is to die for, veges are incredible and it's so simple to use and clean. For those people that hate to cook this is a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Von Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: After hearing many discouraging reviews on other air fryers I was hesitant to order this one, even though it was highly rated. It's as close to frying as you can get and probably better. Foods stay crisper a little longer since there is no heavy oil to leave it soggy 10 minutes after. It's priced higher that the others but it really works.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Best kitchen gadget my husband has bought me thus far
customer_reviews.text: Best kitchen gadget my husband has bought me thus far! Worth every penny, easy to use and machine washable for a quick and easy clean! Fries everything wonderfully! Although I must put it out there, it can create quite a bit of smoke in the house so be prepared to turn the hoodvent on or open some windows! 100% recommend for people who want to enjoy fried food without all the oil!
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Just after warranty expired, unit quit working
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this fryer, but one day after the warranty expired; the unit just quit working. I tried to reset the unit, unplugging, resetting the temp and time, and still no good results. The meat was still raw. I have used this on a regular basis, cleaned it per the manufacturer's instructions, and never any uncooked food. Not too happy with high price paid, only to have it crap out after the warranty expired.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Kruse

customer_reviews.title: Extremly happy
customer_reviews.text: My whole family love the air fryer. I received it on 12/1/17. I have cooked french fries, chicken tenders, delmonico steak, fish ect. Everything turned out perfect juicy and the perfect amount of crunch. My husband is EXTREMELY picky eater he loved everything I made him. Highly recommend this item!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Caught on fire and does not work anymore!
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed in this EXPENSIVE Philips Air Fryer. Barely 1 year after I bought it, the basket in the air fryer caught on fire while heating up. Few days later, when trying to use it again, the air fryer would not turn on! The unit is dead! Thank You very much Philips, I bought a $300.00 air fryer, that nearly may have burnt my house and it is not working anymore. Would definitely not buy Philips again, a $100.00 air fryer would probably do the same job!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Mo

customer_reviews.title: and the coil has dropped, I spend $299 buy this expensive airfryer, finally feel very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: i buy a Philips XL Airfryer from Amazon as a gift for Mother's Day,and received the item yesterday, but when i open the box, i found the handle has broken down, and the coil has dropped, I spend $299 buy this expensive airfryer, finally feel very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: lyan960

customer_reviews.title: Love Love This Airfryer
customer_reviews.text: I looked at many airfryers before I purchased this Phillips HD9240/94 Avance XL Digital Airfryer. It was more expensive then others, but well worth the price. One of the things I really liked was that the basket was so easy to remove and put back in without rubbing the nonstick surface off as I had heard about with other airfryers. It works great, very easy to clean, and the food is wonderful! I like it so much that I bought 4 more as Christmas gifts last year. I hear all the time "Nan, we love the airfryer!" I would highly recommend this airfryer. Food cooks fast, with no oil and tastes great! It is truly a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Harbold

customer_reviews.title: BUY A LESS EXPENSIVE ONE
customer_reviews.text: THOUGHT I WAS BUYING THE BEST NOT SO, AFTER A FEW USES SMOKED UP THE HOUSE TRIED TO CLEAN ELEMENT, BUT ONE USE AND SET OFF SMOKE ALARMS, FROM THEN ON PUT ON OUTSIDE PATIO TO USE. DO LOVE CHICKEN COOKED IN THIS THING BUT MANUFACTURE NEED TO PUT A PROTECTIVE SHEILD OVER HEATING ELEMENT. AND REDUCE THE PRICE!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alberta G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Fast and Juicy Baking.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first air fryer and I am most impressed. The fryer cook in about half the time of our table top convection oven and does not burn food easily. Great for baking nuts, chicken, ribs, fish sticks, and other things I am still experimenting with cooking. But a bit expensive. But in the long run it will pay for itself in time saved and probably lower electrical costs.
customer_reviews.author: Frank G.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Made amazing fries and wings. But smoked up the house in the process.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good capacity, simple to use
customer_reviews.text: The Phillips XL air fryer is large enough to make it worthwhile, and is easy to use and clean. It does tend to smoke if there is anything that falls through into the main compartment, so it's necessary to keep that clean. It is easy to remove and clean. The grill accessory is also useful.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to cooking some items
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to cooking some items. Breakfast meats, meatballs, frozen fries, tator tots, etc. Experiment with the types of food you have to see what works best. It also can dehydrate thinly slice fruit. Great idea for healthy snacks. Experiment with the timing to get better and faster result for the dehydrating. It probably not a bad idea to get an airfryer cook book just to see other ideas. One of the best investments I have done. The only downside is the accessories offered don't fit the extra large airfryer I bought, but I could tell that when I ordered it. However as it is, it is still a great fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Epic
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It's simply amazing. Definitely recommend this to anyone who is in the market for an air fryer that will be uses regularly. JUST KEEP IT CLEAN! (AKA clean it after every use) or the non stick will start to peel! Over 50 uses on mine and it still looks and performs like new!
customer_reviews.author: Myke and Kelly

customer_reviews.title: high quality
customer_reviews.text: I had a Paula Deen Air fryer which I loved, while it lasted. After really getting to love having Air Fryer it stopped working in less than one year. I decided to upgrade to Philips. It has a high price tag but seems to be better made so far. It has a slide out for the door so no struggle to get the door to close. I use it almost everyday if not a couple times a day. I will say the capacity of the basket seems to be less than the Paula Deen AF.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Lane

customer_reviews.title: Great product, bought and second one as a gift.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first air fryer and it’s impressive in cook times compared to the oven or deep fryer. Still learning how to fry items other than pre beaded foods. have made a few messes and cleaning is fairly decent and may require soaking as the manual states. As with deep fryers the basket is usually the hardest to clean.
customer_reviews.author: S0LIDCHA0S_71

customer_reviews.title: Excellent air fryer but difficult to clean
customer_reviews.text: The quality is okay. But it's really difficult to clean it. The grease gets stuck and there is no good way to remove it. I would really appreciate any input. But on the other side of fries the food very well.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan2014

customer_reviews.title: Love the gadget, but cleaning the basket........
customer_reviews.text: I really like this gadget as far as kitchen gadgets go. The only real complaint I have is that the basket is miserable to clean. Maybe I'm not domestic enough for it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Orange

customer_reviews.title: No more frying with grease
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical at first but after trying it out, I'm convinced. The wings were crisp, juicy and delicious and grease free. And the steak came out just the way I like it. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Arthur R. Banks

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitchen Addition, Must Have
customer_reviews.text: I have owned every kitchen "gadget" known to man, I was skeptical about this new one. I have had it for several months now and it a real gem. I only cook small amounts but I use it everyday. It cooks everything to perfection, I just love it. Highly recommend for singles or couples.
customer_reviews.author: Kmlrd

customer_reviews.title: Broke down right away, very sharp metal all around the edges
customer_reviews.text: The lighted display dimmed to almost nothing after one month, making it nearly impossible to see what the time or temperature was. I have to count the number of times I push the button. The edges of the basket and the drawer that you have to take out and wash are so sharp that they cut your fingers. Poor workmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy A. Kendrick

customer_reviews.title: Easy and delicious.
customer_reviews.text: Food comes out delicious! I've made baked potatoes, French fries, fried ravioli, chicken strips, egg rolls, and more to come! I never ate that many fried things, but using the air fryer makes things cook using little or no oil. I'm trying things I wouldn't usually make and enjoying them.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: We are very pleased with how it works
customer_reviews.text: We have had an air fryer for several years it had a rotating paddle to move the food it worked well. We bought this one because of its size and that it did not have moving paddles. We are very pleased with how it works. Great French fries, and egg rolls. Does a nice job of heating most foods.
customer_reviews.author: RichH

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and tasty way to eat without grease.
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift so I have not used it. My daughter and her husband asked for this as a gift and they told me they are very happy with it. They felt the food tasted good and they loved not having to give up a fried food because of health issues.
customer_reviews.author: glenda

customer_reviews.title: Phil airfryer 2 generation
customer_reviews.text: The machine works great this new one just smokes too much. Smokes up the house with no oil added or seasoning added to food. Tried adding water to the bottom as well but still smokes up pretty badly. The first generation worked great
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Love the fryer, Hate the smoke
customer_reviews.text: Love the fryer but it’s Smokey when you cook chicken. I’m mean whole house, open up your windows smoky. Thought it was just a defect with the one I had, bought another, same thing. But it’s only with chicken. Maybe it’s the chicken lol
customer_reviews.author: Eugene J. Drake Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great Airfryer.
customer_reviews.text: Love my air fryer. Made batches of different foods. Still trying to learn how to make things crisper, but I know they will never be as crisp as fried foods. Though, it’s already starting to rust underneath the wire basket, but that’s to be expected from use. Glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Sean W.

customer_reviews.title: and they came out just like the deep fryer
customer_reviews.text: This airfryer Is well worth the money. My wife made double breaded wings from scratch, and they came out just like the deep fryer. She just cooked them 10 minutes longer than the suggested time to get that golden brown breading. We were skeptical, but extremely happy with the product. You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Skyking402

customer_reviews.title: I really like the air fryer
customer_reviews.text: I really like the air fryer. The french fries, the steak and the chicken wings are delicious, this is the second air fryer I have, it seems that this is better quality but when I do steak it comes out too much smoke that it is impossible to have the house without the windows open, never I had this problem with the other brand I do not know if there is a solution for that or where it comes from, if it is from the steak or from the fat that falls on the top where it is hot
customer_reviews.author: Denis Bozickovic

customer_reviews.title: GREAT air fryer; how did I live without it!?
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my air fryer. Cooks my steak, fish and pork chops consistently and on point. I say spend the extra money. Washes super easily. I believe with this product, you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: When it works great but broke after one week.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to purchase one of these air dryers. The good was that it cooked extremely well and was super easy to use and clean up. The bad it broke after only one week of use. The fan stopped working and the unit would automatically shut down.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Van Deusen

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I used it once (that's right 1 (ONE) time), the chicken breast came out great. Cleaned it, put it on the shelf for the next use. About 2 months later I got my food prepped, the air fryer prepped plugged it in and......NOTHING. It would NOT even come on. I did a double check, then a triple check and I had everything correct. It has not worked. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Rosa G.

customer_reviews.title: For the amount of money we spent on this, ...
customer_reviews.text: For the amount of money we spent on this, we should have stuck with our cheap one from Target. Nothing special. Save yourself some money and go to Target.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Stay away!
customer_reviews.text: this product worked great the first few months. I don't use it often since and it still broke. My problem is that after a few minutes the fryer would just stop. I can program 12min to cook my steak and half way through it'll quit. It is still on but the thing resets on its own. So I have to go and input my settings and start over again.
customer_reviews.author: CanaKnight

customer_reviews.title: Catches fire - DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: We loved this sir fryer. I didn’t regret spending 3x what other air fryers did. Until... Last night it started smoking in the top part. I luckily was right there when it happened and we got it out of the house before it could set fire to our kitchen. Had I been in the other room, it would have been a different story. This happened after we had turned it off and served the nuggets to my son.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Langley

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful to use and very good food
customer_reviews.text: It is my best purchase ever. The food is delicious and heathy. It is very easy to operate. Kids love fries so now I can cook fries more often since we do not use olive oil. Additionally I am saving money since cold press olive oil is very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fry It Up
customer_reviews.text: Returned the item as soon as it arrived in exchange for different model.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Allen

customer_reviews.title: Never used
customer_reviews.text: I never tried this purchase. The basket seemed very small for my purposes. I returned without any issues and bought a Cuisinart mini-oven that does hot air fry, toasts, convection bakes, and more. Plus it was $99 cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Ronan

customer_reviews.title: Philips.Starfish Air fryer XL
customer_reviews.text: Just as described only thing the directions to how to work it needs a improvement i had to view YouTube to understand that info only thing i didn't like.
customer_reviews.author: Bren

customer_reviews.title: roomy and evenly fried
customer_reviews.text: I like the sleek look of it, the perfect size to cook for 4 and ease of cleaning. Be careful with edge of pans as they are a little too sharp for my hand during my first cleanings but I have learned how to handle it with caution. Overall great product although pricier than most, it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this product. So glad that I bought it as a gift as the family really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Expensive hunk of garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived broken. Will not preheat, cook, turn on. Big paper weight. Very disappointed in the customer service and trouble shooting steps.
customer_reviews.author: Jake in Japan.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite kitchen appliance!
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down our favorite kitchen appliance. It is perfect for homemade or frozen french fries, chicken nuggets, frozen Hot Pockets, and more. With the accessory pack that can be purchased, I have made muffins, pies, baked apples....etc. I don't know how we lived without this device!
customer_reviews.author: LGist

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: We use this every day. Makes life so much easier and I'd suggest buying the skillet to go with the basket.

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised on TV...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Wasn't sure that I believed all of the claims that I saw on TV, but it is definitely a good way to go for cooking more healthy meals.
customer_reviews.author: Tsunami

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: It broke within one month .I press the plus key and the whole face fell into the machine all the little springs fell onto electric switch and shorted out . Also the pan is easy to clean however all the oils and grease from the food accumulates in the fan and heating elements impossible to clean those areas.
customer_reviews.author: slickwatts

customer_reviews.title: Usually, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: And, that is exactly my experience with this air fryer. No muss, no fuss...just pop in the fries and let the cooker do its job. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: William C.

customer_reviews.title: Turns off after a few minutes
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a year and from day one it turns off after about 5 minutes of use. We did not notice it because we thought the timer was shutting it off. Cannot recommend this product, I had a different brand but was smaller and never had an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Merced

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this air fryer for about a year. It still works great. Large capacity to others I've seen. Use it regularly!

customer_reviews.title: The absolute best!! My finicky eaters love whatever comes out ...

customer_reviews.author: Stitcher59

customer_reviews.title: This device is amazing. It cooks good food in less than 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: This device is amazing. It cooks good food in less than 5 min. I mean stuff that takes 30 min done in 5 min. That's amazing! I can make spring rolls, motzarella sticks, and fries in a flash!
customer_reviews.author: Nessa

customer_reviews.title: Love it

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth it
customer_reviews.text: So far so good - no issues and it works great- great flavors and wings come out crispy outside and moist Inside. - but of advise - def clean this after every use, don’t get lazy.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have recommended this to many people. Best grilled cheese ever! French fries are perfect! So much more!

customer_reviews.title: Must have appliance
customer_reviews.text: Love this air fryer! Hardly use our stovetop since we got it! Makes crunchy chicken that looks like it’s been fried, and moist and juicy inside! We’ve made kale chips, garbanzo beans, both with a great crunch! Fries come out great for my kids and healthier than frying, also faster!
customer_reviews.author: staci Costopoulos

customer_reviews.title: Great for reheating fries and other fried foods
customer_reviews.text: Have only used this for reheating deep-fried foods so far, and this does a great job! We love how it removes so much of the oil from fried foods and leave us with tasty, crispy foods (read Fries).

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and does so much I doubt we ...

customer_reviews.title: Good produce well satisfied.

Will most likely purchase more for the kids christmas gifts. But for the price I believe the accessories should be included.

product_meta.title: Philips Starfish Technology XL Airfryer, Digital Interface, Black - 2.65lb/3.5qt HD9240/94
product_meta.description:
With the Philips Air fryer, you can cook healthier meals without giving up the taste and texture of your favorite foods. Using our unique rapid air technology, the air fryer fries, bakes, roasts and grills with a tablespoon or less of oil making it a perfect solution for fast and healthy meals and snacks. Automatic shut-off.

BRAND STORY
By Philips
feature_bullets: Rapid air technology circulates hot air with speed and precision to cook food evenly in the air fryer
Smart preset button that memorizes the setting for your favorite food. Non-slip feet
Large 2.65-pounds. Cooking capacity is the perfect capacity to feed 4 people. Power- 1750 watts. Voltage- 120 volts
Digital touchscreen interface lets you easily customize the setting to cook your food exactly as you want
Removable nonstick drawer and food basket are dishwasher safe. Dimensions of product (LxWxH): 16.6 X 12.36 X 11.88 inches. Refer to the PDF attached below in technical specification for user manual

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars795 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
